website.title: E-Commerce
website.description: Order Cakes & Cookies Easily in Your Hand
website.long_desc: A bakery shop that reaches more customers through modern web. Enjoy Indonesian cakes & cookies through digital discovery. Get your favorite taste easily!
website.problem: A bakery shop that wants to expand their market, as well as provide a better customer experience to increase business sales.
website.solution: We create a website that showcases products 24/7, provides comprehensive information to customers, and automates the ordering and payment process.
